column6:
WELCOME!

Minutes from Uptown, minutes from Downtown, walk to a wide array of restaurants and shopping.

This beautiful property offers room to breathe, privacy to swim in your own luxurious outdoor oasis and a wraparound patio to entertain in comfort. 

Situated in a truly prime location bordering Turtle Creek and Highland Park, this fabulous one-story Tudor residence is nestled on a peaceful, closed street.

NOTE: The house rents for $4850/month on a long-term basis and is not for sale. Thx!
column9: Upscale home with pool... Best location in Dallas!
